body_html:
@a-doumoulakis Unfortunately, we have another sanity check failure:

FAIL:
buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
204,205c204,206
< deps = if_ccpp(["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],
< ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"],
---
> deps = if_ccpp(
> ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],
> ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"],
Please fix manually or run buildifier <file> to auto-fix.

Maybe you could run buildifier on all the BUILD file to knock all these failures in one go ?

body:
@a-doumoulakis Unfortunately, we have another sanity check failure:

`FAIL:`
 `buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.`
`buildifier suggested the following changes:`
`204,205c204,206`
`<     deps = if_ccpp(["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],`
`<                    ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"],`
`---`
`>     deps = if_ccpp(`
`>         ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:syclrt"],`
`>         ["@local_config_sycl//sycl:sycl_headers"],`
`Please fix manually or run buildifier <file> to auto-fix.`

Maybe you could run [buildifier](https://github.com/bazelbuild/buildtools) on all the BUILD file to knock all these failures in one go ?
